scripts.build: pnpm gen-prod-env && pnpm fix-nexus-prisma && tsc && pnpm package && pnpm bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p bundle && pnpm copy-migration-engine-bin && cd bundle && mv ../server aard && mv ../../web/dist/index.html . && mv ../../web/dist/assets . && mkdir -p prisma && cp -R ../prisma/migrations prisma && cp ../prisma/schema.prisma prisma
scripts.copy-migration-engine-bin: cd bundle && mkdir -p lib && cp ../../../node_modules/.pnpm/@prisma+sdk@3.5.0/node_modules/@prisma/engines/migration-engine-debian-openssl-1.1.x lib
scripts.p:migrate: dotenv -c development -- pnpx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.p:push: dotenv -c development -- pnpx prisma db push
scripts.p:seed: dotenv -c development -- pnpx prisma db seed
scripts.localci: rm -rf ../../../release && rm -rf bundle && pnpm build:full && mv bundle ../../../release && cd ../../../release
